title: dhaya mayi shankari
sahitya:
dayA mayI shankarI tEjon
mayAmruta sAgari dEvi
(dayA)

anupallavi

mAyE mahAdEva manOhari
dyAyE latAngi rAga sancAri
(dayA)

caraNam

hrudayamu ranjillu sumadhura bhAshini ati
mrududhara sukumAri purANi
kAmita phaladAyaka nandini
nAmati karagincu gAnavinOdini

madyama kAlam

sarigamapada nI saptaswara
gamanIya kripAkari nityA kalyANi
(dayA)
